Title: Simply Play MIDI
Description: The simplest way to play MIDI music with Unity. No script is necessary. Everything is defined in the inspector.

Title: Play MIDI with Script and Explore Features
Description: Learn how to integrate MPTK into your application using a script. Utilize the MPTK API with just a few lines of code for each features available.

Title: Multi MIDI Player
Description: Four MidiFilePlayer prefabs are set up in a 3D scene, each demonstrating a simple spatialization function as the camera moves... all without a spatializer plugin!

Title: MIDI File Loading
Description: Load all or a portion of the MIDI events from the MIDI DB or from disk (Pro version). This doesn't include a sequencer, synthesizer, or music playing capabilities. It simply loads and decodes a MIDI file into a more user-friendly MPTKEvent.

Title: MIDI Stream Music
Description: Generate real-time music notes without any MIDI files using just a few lines of code. The Pro version also allows you to play chords and ranges, and apply real-time parameter changes such as attack, effect, and others.

Title: Catch Music
Description: Notes are read from a MidiFilePlayer and fall onto a conveyor belt. At the end, they are played with a MidiStreamPlayer. Unfortunately, some monsters come to disturb the music. This could potentially become a game!

Title: MIDI Spatialization
Description: An erratic sphere plays MIDI music to experiment with the Spatialization function. Set the spatialization mode in Unity for an optimal experience!

Title: MIDI Play List
Description: Play a list of MIDI files or parts of MIDI files with time overlap.

Title: Euclidean Rhythm
Description: An interesting and original algorithm to generate rhythms. Additionally, interactive synthesizer parameters can be changed by the user, and real-time events can be applied for a highly accurate music generator.

Title: MIDI File Writer
Description: Numerous short examples for building, writing, and directly playing MIDI files with the easy-to-use MPTKWriter API class. This class also serves as the foundation for the MIDI Editor.

Title: Play External MIDI
Description: Select MIDI files from your desktop or a website and play them. Check out the amazing roulette MIDI!

Title: Channel and Track Spatialization
Description: Each sphere is associated with a dedicated MIDI Synth by channel or track, each with its own audio source and real-time 3D position. You can fly between instruments and locate each instrument in a 3D space. Set the spatialization mode in Unity for an optimal experience.

Title: Read MIDI Keyboard and Play Notes
Description: Demo for the prefab MidiInReader, capable of reading MIDI events from a connected MIDI keyboard. In the demo, MIDI events from the keyboard are played by the MPTK MIDI Synth. A plugin available on the website is required for installation.

Title: Read/Write from/to a MIDI Keyboard
Description: Read and write MIDI events from/to a connected MIDI keyboard. A plugin available on the website is required for installation.

Title: Merge MIDI Files
Description: Load MIDI files from the MIDI DB, merge or insert them at a defined position, and save them as external MIDI files or in the MIDI DB. All these actions can be performed while playing!

Title: Inner Loop
Description: A quick demonstration for MIDI inner loop. A very accurate MIDI looper.

Title: Music Wood Box
Description: Transform your smartphone or tablet into a wood instrument. Enjoy the sensitive surface with low latency for playing music. Always in development mode.

Title: Load External SoundFont
Description: Load a SoundFont from a website or from your device. Perfect for downsizing your app or offering options for different instruments or styles.
